required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Comparing Linezolid 600 Mg Oral Suspension With 600 Mg Tablet In Chinese Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label, Single Dose, 2-Way, Randomized Cross-Over Bioequivalence Study Comparing Linezolid 600 Mg Oral Suspension With 600 Mg Tablet In Chinese Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to estimate the bioequivalence comparing Linezolid 600 MG Oral Suspension with 600 MG tablet in Chinese healthy male subjects. This study data will be used to support Linezolid OS NDA in China.

detailed_description.textblock: To support Linezolid NDA in China.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUClast)
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero (pre-dose) to the time of the last measurable concentration (AUClast).
Maximum observed plasma concentration within the dosing interval was directly obtained from the concentration-time data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time [AUC (0-∞)]
secondary_outcome.description: AUC (0-∞) = Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) from time zero (pre-dose) to extrapolated infinite time (0-∞). It is obtained from AUC (0-t) plus AUC (t-∞).

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: The time of the first occurrence of peak concentration observed directly from data.
Plasma terminal half-life is the time measured for the plasma concentration to decrease by one half.

arm_group.description: Subjects will accept Linezolid OS 600 MG first, after 4 days wash-out, then will accept Linezolid tablet 600 MG.
Subjects will accept Linezolid tablet 600 MG first, after 4 days wash-out, then will accept Linezolid OS 600 MG.

intervention.description: Linezolid OS 600 MG Linezolid Tablet 600 MG
Linezolid Tablet 600 MG Linezolid OS 600 MG

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers.
- 18-40 years old, male.
- BMI 19-24kg/m2.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Alcohol, drug, smoke user.
- Sensitive to oxazolidinones antibiotics class drug or heparin.
- Severe medical or psychiatric condition or laboratory abnormality.
- Blood donation.
- 12-ECG abnormal.
- Treatment with study drug; clinically significant.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Participants were enrolled at a single site in China.

group.title: Linezolid 600 mg Oral Suspension, Then Linezolid 600 mg Tablet
group.description: Linezolid oral suspension 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM, after fasting overnight) on Day 1 in first intervention period and Linezolid tablet 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM, after fasting overnight) on Day 1 in second intervention period (after washout period).

group.title: Linezolid 600 mg Tablet, Then Linezolid 600 mg Oral Suspension
group.description: Linezolid tablet 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM, after fasting overnight) on Day 1 in first intervention period and Linezolid oral suspension 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM, after fasting overnight) on Day 1 in second intervention period (after washout period).

group.title: Linezolid
group.description: Linezolid 600 mg once (oral suspension or tablet) in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM) on Day 1 after fasting overnight.

outcome.title: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUClast)
outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero (pre-dose) to the time of the last measurable concentration (AUClast).
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic concentration population: all randomized and treated participants who had at least 1 concentration in at least 1 treatment period.

group.title: Linezolid 600 mg Oral Suspension
group.description: Linezolid oral suspension 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM) on Day 1 after fasting overnight.

group.title: Linezolid 600 mg Tablet
group.description: Linezolid tablet 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM) on Day 1 after fasting overnight.

measure.title: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUClast)
measure.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero (pre-dose) to the time of the last measurable concentration (AUClast).
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic concentration population: all randomized and treated participants who had at least 1 concentration in at least 1 treatment period.

analysis.groups_desc: Natural log transformed AUClast of linezolid was analyzed using a mixed effect model with sequence, period and treatment as fixed effects and participant within sequence as a random effect.
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: The adjusted mean differences and 90% CIs for the differences were exponentiated to provide estimates of the ratio of adjusted geometric means (Test/Reference) and 90% CIs for the ratios. Linezolid 600 mg oral suspension was the Test treatment, while linezolid 600 mg tablet was the Reference treatment.

outcome.title: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax)
outcome.description: Maximum observed plasma concentration within the dosing interval was directly obtained from the concentration-time data.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic concentration population: all randomized and treated participants who had at least 1 concentration in at least 1 treatment period.

group.description: Linezolid oral suspension 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM) on Day 1 after fasting overnight.

group.title: Linezolid 600 mg Tablet
group.description: Linezolid tablet 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM) on Day 1 after fasting overnight.

analysis.groups_desc: Natural log transformed Cmax of linezolid was analyzed using a mixed effect model with sequence, period and treatment as fixed effects and participant within sequence as a random effect.
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: The adjusted mean differences and 90% CIs for the differences were exponentiated to provide estimates of the ratio of adjusted geometric means (Test/Reference) and 90% CIs for the ratios. Linezolid 600 mg oral suspension was the Test treatment, while linezolid 600 mg tablet was the Reference treatment.

outcome.description: AUC (0-∞) = Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) from time zero (pre-dose) to extrapolated infinite time (0-∞). It is obtained from AUC (0-t) plus AUC (t-∞).
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic concentration population: all randomized and treated participants who had at least 1 concentration in at least 1 treatment period.

Linezolid 600 mg oral suspension was the Test treatment, while linezolid 600 mg tablet was the Reference treatment.

reported_events.desc: The same event may appear as both an AE and a SAE. However, what is presented are distinct events. An event may be categorized as serious in one participant and as nonserious in another participant, or one participant may have experienced both a serious and nonserious event during the study.

group.title: Linezolid 600 mg Oral Suspension
group.description: Linezolid oral suspension 600 mg once in morning (at approximately 8:00 AM) on Day 1 after fasting overnight.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Pfizer has the right to review disclosures, requesting a delay of less than 60 days. Investigator will postpone single center publications until after disclosure of pooled data (all sites), less than 12 months from study completion/termination at all participating sites. Investigator may not disclose previously undisclosed confidential information other than study results.
